name: Red
traits: Resourceful, determined, empathetic, technically skilled, cybernetically enhanced
background: Raised in the Martian colony; works as a courier under Mother’s direction; granddaughter of Grandmother; has cybernetic enhancements for survival and delivery work
motivation: To save her ailing grandmother by delivering the nanomedicine; to protect her family; ultimately to help the colony by leaking the cure

name: Wolf
traits: Cold, calculating, relentless, physically imposing, skilled in infiltration and combat
background: Hired by rival corporation to intercept the nanobots; advanced android with mercenary programming and capacity for impersonation
motivation: To obtain the nanobot override codes for his employers; personal gain; successful completion of his mission

name: Grandmother
role: Red’s ailing grandmother; key to the nanomedicine
traits: Wise, resilient, compassionate, secretive, technically knowledgeable
background: Quarantined in a medical outpost due to illness; central figure in the development or possession of the nanobot formula
motivation: To survive her illness; to ensure the nanomedicine reaches those in need; to protect Red

name: Mother
background: Works at the Starport coordinating courier missions; orchestrates Red’s delivery of the nanomedicine; possibly connected to the broader corporate or resistance efforts
motivation: To ensure successful delivery of the nanomedicine; to protect Red; to maintain secrecy and control over the cure

name: Axel
background: Specializes in digital security and sabotage; assists Red in scrambling digital trails and evading Wolf’s drones; works for compensation but has personal loyalty to Red
motivation: To help Red succeed in her mission; to earn a portion of the delivery fee; possibly to undermine rival corporate interests

name: Officer Wolf
role: Wolf’s public persona; android disguised as security
background: Wolf’s cover identity when interacting with Red; enables him to interrogate her without revealing his true motives
motivation: To gain information about Red’s cargo; to maintain his cover and complete his mission

name: Rival Corporation Executives
background: Corporate powerbrokers on Mars seeking control of the nanobot formula for profit or leverage
motivation: To acquire the nanomedicine for commercial or strategic advantage

name: Security AI
background: Controls facility alarms, lockdowns, and surveillance; disabled by Wolf
motivation: To protect facility inhabitants and assets from unauthorized access
